pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fragalysis==========Basic RDKit based Python tools for analysis of protein-ligand interactions.Currently contains the following: -1. Clustering - based on WONKA method - but separated from that code-base. Cluster waters, residues, ligands and pharmacophores. (Under development)2. Astex Fragment Network - implementation on the basis of their recent paper3. Conformer generation code - based on known X-ray structures
